com.artemis

Class PooledComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.Component
      • com.artemis.PooledComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerializationTag

    public abstract class PooledComponent
extends Component
    Component type that recycles instances. Expects no final fields.
    See Also:
    to automate pooled component creation.
